org.jasig.cas.util

Class AbstractCipherExecutor<T,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.util.AbstractCipherExecutor<T,R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CipherExecutor<T,R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultCipherExecutor, NoOpCipherExecutor, ShiroCipherExecutor

    public abstract class AbstractCipherExecutor<T,R>
extends Object
implements CipherExecutor<T,R>
    Abstract cipher to provide common operations around signing objects.

    4.2
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
